General.Name: Brookfield Renewable Corp
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Brookfield Renewable Corporation owns and operates a portfolio of renewable power and sustainable solution assets. The company's portfolio consists of hydroelectric, wind, utility-scale solar, distributed generation, pumped storage, carbon capture and storage, cogeneration, biomass, and eFuels. Its operations consist of approximately 13,948 megawatts of installed hydroelectric, wind, solar, and storage and ancillary capacity located in Brazil, Colombia, North America, and Europe. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in New York, New York. Brookfield Renewable Corporation is a subsidiary of Brookfield Renewable Partners L.P.
General.Address: 250 Vesey Street, New York, NY, United States, 10281-1023
